saśailavanadhātrīṇāṃ yathādhāro ’hināyakaḥ/
sarveṣāṃ yogatantrāṇāṃ tathādhāro hi kuṇḍalī//
suptā guruprasādena yathā jāgarti kuṇḍalī/
tathā sarvāṇi padmāni bhidyante granthayo’pi ca//
prāṇasya śūnyapadavīṃ
yathā rājapadāyate/
tathā cittaṃ nirālambaṃ tathā kālasya vañcanam//
suṣumṇā śūnyapadavī brahmarandhramahāpathaḥ/
śmaśānaṃ śāmbhavī madhyaṃmārgeś cety ekavācakam//
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena prabodhayatum īśvarīm/
brahmadvāramukhe suptāṃ mudrābhyāsaṃ samācaret//
mahāmudrā mahābandho mahāvedhaś ca khecarī/
uḍḍīyāṇo mūla°bandhāś ca bandho jālaṃjarābhidhaḥ//
karaṇī viparītākhyā vajrolī śakticālanam/
idaṃ ca mudrādaśakaṃ jarāmaraṇanāśanam//
ādināthoditaṃ divyam aṣṭaiśvaryapradāyakam/
vallabhaṃ sarvasiddhānāṃ durlabhaṃ marutām api//
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena yathā ratnakaraṇḍakam/
kasyacin naiva vaktavyā kulastrīṣu rataṃ yathā//
pādamūlena vāmena yoniṃ saṃpīḍya dakṣiṇam/
pādaṃ prasāditaṃ dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ pūrayemukham//
kaṇṭhe bandha samāropya dhārayed vāyum ūrdhvataḥ/
pathi daṇḍahataḥ sarpo daṇḍākāraḥ prayujyate//
ṛjvībhūtā tathā śakti kuṇḍalī sahasā bhavet/
tadāsau maraṇīvasthāṃ jāyate dvipuṭāā[śr]i ..//
tataḥ śanaiḥ śanair eva recayen na tu vegataḥ/
iyaṃ khalu mahāmudrā mahāsiddhaiḥ praśasyate//
mahākleśādayo doṣā jīryante maraṇādayaḥ/
mahāmudrā[ś] ca tenaiva vadanti vibudhottamāḥ//
cāndrāṅge tu samabhyasya sūryāṅge° °ṣu samabhyaset/
yāvat tulyā bhavat saṃkhyā tato mudrāṃ visarjayet//
na hi pathyam apathyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve’pi nīrasāḥ/
api bhuktaṃ viṣaṃ khāraṃ pīyūṣam iva jīryate//
kṣayakuṣṭhaṃgudāvartagulmājīrṇapurogamāḥ/
doṣāḥ sarve kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo’bhyaset//
kathiteyaṃ mahāmudrā mahāsiddhikarī nṛṇām/
gopanīyā prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit//
pārṣṇiṃ vāmasya pādasya yonisthāne niyojayet/
vāmorūpari saṃsthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ caraṇaṃ tathā//
pūrayitvā tato vāyuṃ hṛdaye cibukaṃ dṛḍham/
niṣpīḍya yonim ākuñcya mano madhye niyojayet//
dhārayitvā yathāśakti recayed anilaṃ śanaiḥ//
savyāṅge ca samabhyasya dakṣiṇāṅge samabhyaset//
matam etat tu keṣāṃcit kaṇṭhabandhaṃ vivarjayet/
rājadantasthajihvāyā(ṃ) bandhaś ca staṃbhayeddhi tat//
ayaṃ kila mahābandho mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
kālapāśamahābandhavimocanavicakṣaṇaḥ//
ayaṃ ca sarvanāḍīnāūrdhvagativibodhakaḥ/
triveṇīsaṅgamaṃ dhatte kedāraṃ prāpaye naraḥ//
rūpalāvaṇyasaṃpannā yathā strī puruṣaṃ vinā/
mahāmudrāmahābandha mahāvedha(ṃ) vinā tathā//
mahābandhasthito yogī kṛtvā pūrakam ekadhīḥ/
vāyunāṃ gatim āvṛtya nibhṛtaṃ kaṇṭhamudrayā//
samahastayugau bhūmau sphidau saṃ[c]ālayecc chanaiḥ/
puṭadvayaṃ samākramya vāyuḥ sphurati tatparaṃ/
bandhenānena sādhayet sarvam īpsitam//
somasūryāgnisambandhā jāyate cāmṛtāye vaiḥ/
mṛtāvasthā samutpannā tato vāyuṃ virecayet//
mahāvedho’yaabhyāso mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
valipalitavedhaghnaḥ sevyate sādhakottamaiḥ//
mahāmudrātrayatraṃguhyaṃ jarāmṛtyuvināśanam/
vahnivṛddhikaraṃ viśvam aṇimādiguṇapradam//
aṣṭadhā kriyate caikaṃyāmaṃ yamāṃ dine dine/
puṇyasaṃcārasabhāvī pāpaughabhiduraṃ sadā//
samyakśikṣāvatāevaṃ svalpaṃ prathamasādhane/
vahnistrīpathasevanamm ādau varjanam ādiśet//
chedanacālanadohaiḥ kalāṃ krameṇa pravardhayet/
sā yāvad bhrūmadhya spṛśati tadānī siddhiḥ//
kapālakuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā/
bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati carī//
kalāṃ parāṅmukhīṃ kṛtvā /
mudrā vyomacakraṃ tad ucyate/
rasanām ūrdhvagāṃ kṛtvā
kṣaṇārdhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhati/
kṣaṇena mucyate yogī vyādhimṛtyujarādibhiḥ//
na roga maraṇaṃ tasya na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā/
na ca mūrchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm//
cittaṃ carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā/
tenaiva khecarī mudrā sarva siddhair namaskṛtā//
khecaryā mudritaṃ yena vicaran/raṃ lambikordhvataḥ/
tasya na kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāśleṣitasya ca//
calito’pi yadā binduḥ saṃprāptoyonimaṇḍalam/
vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ haṭhāc chaktyānibadhno yonimudrayā//

ūrdhvajihvā sthiro bhūtvā somapānaṃ karoti yaḥ/
māsārdhena na saṃdeho mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit//
nityaṃ somakalāpūrṇaṃ śarīraṃ yasya dehinaḥ/
takṣakeṇāpi dṛṣṭasya viṣaṃ tasya na sarpati//
indhanāni yathā vahnitailāvṛtti va dīpikaḥ/
tathā somakalāpūrṇaṃ dehī dehaṃ na muñcati//
gomāṃsaṃ bhakṣayen nityaṃ pibed amaravāruṇīm/
kulīnaṃ tam ahaṃ manye tv itare kulaghātakāḥ//
gośabdenoditā jihvā tatpraveśo hi tāluni/
gomāṃsaṃbhakṣaṇaṃ tat tu mahāpātakanāśanam//

sā syād amaravāruṇī//

d ūrdhvāsyo rasanāṃ ca yāmya vivare śaktiṃ parāṃ cintayet/
utkallolakalājalaṃ ca vimalaṃ dhārāmṛtaṃ yaḥ pibet
nirdoṣaṃ sa mṛṇālakomalavapurr yogī ciraṃ jīvati//
cumbantī yadi lambikāgram aniśaṃ jihvā rasasyandinī
sakṣārā kaṭukāsa dugdhasadṛśā madhvājyatulyātathā/
vyādhīnāṃ haraṇaṃ jarāntakaraṇaṃ śastrāṃgamodgīraṇaṃ
tasya syād amaratvam aṣṭaguṇavat siddhāṅganākarṣaṇam//
ekaṃ sṛṣṭimayaṃ bījaṃ ekā mudrā ca khecarī/
eko devo nirālamba ekāvasthā manonmanī//
pārṣṇibhāgena saṃpīḍya yonim ākuñcayedṛḍhaṃ/
apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandho’yam ucyate//
adhogatiapānaivam ūrdhvagaṃ kurute balāt/
ākuñcanena taṃ prāhur mūlabandhaṃ hi yoginaḥ//
gudaṃ pārṣṇyā ca saṃpīḍya vāyum ākuñcayed balāt/
vāraṃ vāraṃ yathā cordhvaṃ samāyāti samīraṇaḥ//
prāṇāpānau nādabindū mūlabandhena caikatām/
gatvā yogasya saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnoty e° °va na saṃśayaḥ//
apānaprāṇayor aikyaṃ kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ/
yuvā bhavati vṛddho’pi satataṃ mūlabandhanāt//
apāne cordhvage jāte prayāte vahnimaṇḍale/
tathānaleśikhā dīrghā vāyunā preritā tathā//
yātā yāto vahnyapānau prāṇamūla svarūpakau/
tenātyantapradīpas tu jvalano dehajas tathā//
tena kuṇḍalinī suptā saṃtaptā saṃprabudhyati/
daṇḍāhatā bhujaṅgīva viśvasya ṛjutāṃ vrajet//
bilaṃ praviṣṭeva tato brahmanāḍyantaraṃ vrajet/
tasmān nityaṃ mūlabandhaḥ kartavyo yogibhiḥ sadā//
ūrdhvo yena suṣumṇāyāṃ prāṇamuḍyayate yataḥ/
tasmāuḍḍiyāṇākhyo’yaṃ yogibhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ//
uḍḍiyāṇaṃ kurute yasmād aviśrāntaṃ mahākhagaḥ/
uḍḍīyāṇaṃ tad eva syāt tatra bandho ’bhidhīyate//
udare paścimaṃ tānaṃ nābher ūrdhvaṃ ca kārayet/
uḍḍiyāṇo hy asau bandho mṛtyumātaṅgakesarī//
uḍḍiyāṇaṃ tu sahajaṃ guruṇā kathitaṃ sadā/
abhyaseyo hy atandras vṛddho’pi taruṇo bhavet//
nābher ūrdhvaadhaḥkāya tāṇaṃ kuryāt prayatnataḥ/
yogī sam°abhyasenn mṛtyuṃ jayaty eva na saṃśayaḥ//

kaṇṭham ākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayedṛḍham icchayā/
